entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
